title: 24 Best Early Prime Day Deals Under $100 That Come in Under Budget (2025)
description: Act quickly—these five-star products won't last long
author: Audrey Lee, Blake Bakkila
excerpt: The best early Prime Day deals under $100 on tech, furniture, and decor are here. Get in early—these five-star products won't last long
text: All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. html:
All products featured on Architectural Digest are independently selected by our editors. However, we may receive compensation from retailers and/or from purchases of products through these links.

If you’re anything like us, then you appreciate a good markdown. In other words, we think you’re gonna like the best early Prime Day deals under $100 (some of which are dropping as early as this week).

Last year’s summer Prime Day event took place in mid-July—but we’re still waiting on official word for this year's exact dates. Since the early bird gets the worm (and we don’t want you to feel any FOMO when it comes to the sales extravaganza), we’ve combed through the early promotions in search of the best home deals under $100 you can scoop up right now. True to form, Amazon has the best prices on best-selling cookware, cult-favorite kitchen appliances (including the Instant Pot and countless air fryers), home decor, and tech deals (like Bluetooth speakers, laptop accessories, robot vacuums, and air purifiers)—all under $100.

If you’re looking to come out of this year’s first Prime Day sales event smelling like a rose, consider this your cheat sheet to kick off summer with some serious savings. In addition to an unbeatable price point, the below selections boast rave reviews and five-star ratings (AKA you'll want to act fast). Plus, you can also read more about our Amazon favorites, review our top choices for early Prime Day deals on furniture, mattresses, sheets, and bath towels too.

Our Top Picks:

  • Furniture: Sweetcrispy Office Computer Desk Chair, $70 $57
  • Decor: Loloi x Chris Loves Julia Polly Rug, $100 $95
  • Air Purifiers: Dreo Tower Fan, $80 $70
  • Smart Home and Tech: Amazon Echo Pop Alexa Speaker, $40 $25
  • Kitchen Appliances: Staub Mini Round Cocotte (Set of 3), $70 $60

Best Amazon Prime Day Deals Under $100: Furniture

Scouting out the best Amazon Prime furniture that’s both stylish and affordable can definitely feel like an endless scroll, which is why we’ve gone ahead and done the work for you. Whether you’re looking for a budget-friendly home office upgrade in the form of a sturdy office chair, some extra storage, or a handsome dining table (that's technically over $100 but we still think is a great deal), we've got Prime members covered on the best furniture deals under $100.

Lerliuo Rattan Nightstand

Vecelo Platform Bed Frame

Zinus Jen Dining Table

Sweetcrispy Office Chair

Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Decor

While it may take some digging, Amazon’s home decor section has some impressive gems—including mid century silhouettes and Bauhaus designs. CCozy up your space with a new area rug or upgrade your fruit bowl game.

Genimo Washable Rug

Loloi Chris Loves Julia x Polly Runner Rug

BEAUTYPEAK Arch Floor Mirror

Creative Co-Op Round Hammered Metal Bowl

Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Air Purifiers

Combatting airborne dust, dander, and allergens is easy when you have a top-of-the-line filtration device. And though clean air is a must with an excess of allergens floating about, we don’t think it should come at great expense to your wallet. In addition to countless highly rated purifiers for larger spaces, we found multiple buys for under $100 from top brands like Dreo, Levoit, and more.

Levoit Core Mini Air Purifier

GermGuardian Air Purifier

Dreo Tower Fan

Mooka Air Purifier

Best Amazon Prime Day deals under $100: Amazon devices, smart home, and Prime Day tech deals

No need to wait until Black Friday to snag some tech gadgets. Take this as a sign to shop top-notch smart home devices right now—and at under $100 a pop, no less. Apple wireless earbuds with noise cancellation, OLED smart TVs, Ring video doorbells, Alexa-enabled Amazon Echo Dots, and the Amazon Fire TV stick are all discounted right now, with the retailer offering some of the lowest prices we’ve seen on lots of other gems too. Think a Wi-Fi enabled security camera, Kindle e-reader, an Anker power bank to lengthen your phone’s battery life, and more—no coupon needed.

Anker 622 Magnetic Battery

Amazon Echo Pop Alexa Speaker

Apple AirPods 4

Tapo by TP-Link Smart Plug Mini (3-Pack)

Roku Ultra 2024

Sony WH-CH520 Wireless Headphones

Bissell CleanView Compact Upright Vacuum

Waterpik Cordless Pulse Rechargeable Portable Water Flosser

Best Prime Day deals under $100: Kitchen Appliances

Maybe you’ve finally succumbed to the Instant Pot lifestyle or are simply in the mood to upgrade your food processor—either way Amazon will never let you down with their seemingly endless supply of kitchen deals. The site is stocked with dozens of top-rated air fryers, plus every brand of blender, coffee maker, slow cooker, and toaster oven under the sun. Not to mention the high quality selects below will run you less than $100.

Keurig K-Express Coffee Maker

OXO Good Grips Stainless Steel Salad Spinner

Staub Mini Round Cocotte (Set of 3)

Zwilling J.A. Henckels Twin Signature Santoku Knife
